script.line: If we put the STAR, DEATH and TOWER cards together... you're a...
Wow...that's...not how I thought tarot cards worked.

then.line: This whole time I've been thinking that there were only two options...
Architect or competitive eater!
Competitive eater or architect!
But there's something else... a calling I've always felt, since I was nothing more than a sprout...
What is it?
I... can't say. It's a secret. But you'll see, Prota...
Or, if all goes to plan, you won't see. Hahaha! (wink)
I knew that eating was my superpower and now I'll be able to do it for a living!
All I've gotta do is start training.
How many mozzarella sticks have you eaten so far, Jon?
Nine!
Wow, that IS a lot. Sounds like you've got this figured out.
For now. But the journey is a long one, Prota. Competitive eating isn't just about consuming food.
It's also about dipping everything in water so it slides down your throat easier!
Hmm. Sounds... mushy?
It is the life we choose when we take our vows. And I'm ready.
Okay...
I've been feeling like my degree didn't mean anything.
Who needs another architect, you know? People ask.
People ask that?
But it's always been my passion. No matter how silly a degree it is, it's what I love.
And today, you've helped me turn my guilty pleasure... into a destiny I can't wait to fulfill.
Do people not like architects?
Ha! You've got a lot to learn about the world, Prota.
...Okay.

script.line: Well, I'd better go find Minty. Although I'm not sure where to go. Kind of at a dead end here.
Why don't we ask the cards?
Okay, magical tarot... we're looking for a little dog named MINTY! Where could she be?
Wait-- How'd this get into the deck? It's just a pamphlet for the Festi-Ball.
Hmm, I don't...Oh wow, you don't think... It's telling you where to go!
Interesting...I mean, it IS almost time to get ready and head over...
Maybe it's telling me to stay the course and I'll find Minty at the Festi-Ball?
I'd buy that! Fate works in mysterious ways.
In that case, maybe I'll start making my way over. Enjoy the rest of your mozzarella sticks!

then.line: Thanks, but I won't be finishing these. Let's just say in my new life... I'll be eating a lot healthier.
Thanks! This is just my first order. Get ready, world! Spiky Jon's gonna eat you up!
Thanks! Maybe I'll try to build something with 'em.
